oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Halloween and Christmas home movie, undated
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording begins with home footage of children dressing up for Halloween. Followed by a large dinner at a member's house. A child with braces on her legs is helped to stand. A brief service where members handle fire. Lay preaching is performed. Johnny Holbrook is present. One man testifies. Followed by home footage of a Christmas gathering at a member's house. A small service in a home is performed and a member dances with a serpent. Followed by members, including Johnny Holbrook and Larry Elledge, at a church, no service was captured. Then a Christmas gathering at a member's house, where Santa was present. Footage ends with an infant crawling around the floor.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Appalachian Region -- Social life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Imposition of hands; Lay preaching; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region; Witness bearing (Christianity)
Elledge, Larry; Holbrook, Johnny
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Mary Vance Jesus Name Tradition photographs and home movies
